definition: China Central Television (CCTV), abbr. for 中國中央電視台|中国中央电视台[Zhong1 guo2 Zhong1 yang1 Dian4 shi4 tai2]
variant of 視|视[shi4]/variant of 示[shi4]

sentences.english: Xing Zhibin, and Luo Jing anchor the 7p. m. "Network News Broadcast"on China Central Television.
sentences.chinese: 央视邢质斌，罗京主持晚7点的《新闻联播》。

sentences.english: It seems to be shown on CCTV Channel 1 everyday.
sentences.chinese: 那个广告好像每天都在央视一套播出。

sentences.english: She said she had watched some CCTV programs and was a fan of Bai Yansong.
sentences.chinese: 她说，她曾观看央视很多节目，是白岩松的粉丝。

sentences.english: The most famous is the allocation of flats last year, the fire has not yet completed CCTV.
sentences.chinese: 最为著名的，是去年尚未竣工的央视配楼大火。

sentences.english: TV famous host Zhang Quanling with Zheng Yuanbao board chairman.
sentences.chinese: 央视著名主持人张泉灵与郑元豹董事长。

sentences.english: CCTV didn't respond to requests for comment.
The building is next to the CCTV tower, which is due to open in October.
sentences.chinese: 这座大楼邻近定于十月开放的央视大厦。

sentences.english: CCTV to see night life, art shows, a lot of thoughts and feelings.
sentences.chinese: 那晚看央视艺术人生节目，感触颇多。

sentences.english: Therefore, it has profound significance to study CCTV news channel re-editions.
sentences.chinese: 在此背景下谈央视新闻频道改版有较强的研究意义。

sentences.english: An Interview between Shui Junyi, the Eminent Anchor of CCTV and 8 Experts.
sentences.chinese: 央视著名主持人水均益与8位知名专家访谈。

sentences.english: To enlarge force, CCTV net returns wide union to make associate.
sentences.chinese: 为扩大影响力，央视网还广结合作伙伴。

sentences.english: The Yang sees 5 sets of live we does this offend a city war?
sentences.chinese: 央视五套直播咱们这场攻城战？

sentences.english: However these gateway's battle gives CCTV the net unearned gain the opportunity.
sentences.chinese: 不过这些门户的争斗给央视网渔利的机会。

sentences.english: EVERYONE knows that the CCTV Spring Festival Gala has long dominated Chinese New Year`s Eve.
sentences.chinese: 众所周知，央视春晚是每年除夕夜的重头节目。

sentences.english: Now she's comfirming with a performance at this year's CCTV Gala.
sentences.chinese: 如今，她被证实将亮相今年的央视春晚。

sentences.english: CCTV recently stopped broadcasting the NBA playoffs on its Olympic Channel.
sentences.chinese: 央视奥运频道最近突然停止对NBA季后赛的转播。

definition: China Central Television (CCTV), PRC state TV network
China Central Television (CCTV), PRC state TV network
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Zhong1 yang1 Dian4 shi4 tai2

definition: abbr. for 春節聯歡晚會|春节联欢晚会[Chun1 jie2 Lian2 huan1 Wan3 hui4]
satellite TV (abbr. for 衛星電視|卫星电视[wei4 xing1 dian4 shi4])
to broadcast/to air (a TV program etc)
CCTV New Year's Gala, Chinese New Year special/abbr. to 春晚[Chun1 Wan3]
pinyin: Chun1 jie2 Lian2 huan1 Wan3 hui4

definition: to broadcast over a network/(radio or TV) hookup/simulcast
regular column or segment (in a publication or broadcast program)/program (TV or radio)
